welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chestnuthill, USA! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Chestnuthill has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mt Pocono Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hazleton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hazleton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
